message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you, and I'm confident you'll love it.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you, and I'm confident we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500. I think this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand your desire to save more, Bob, but I'm getting close to considering other offers. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $11200. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
